title: INC-20A
purpose: Commencement of business
dueDate: Within 180 days from the date of incorporation of the company.
penalties:
· Company Penalty is INR 50,000/-
 · The officer penalty is INR 1000 per day up to a maximum of INR 1,00,000/-

title: ADT-1
purpose: Appointment/Re- Appointment of Statutory Auditor
dueDate:
· First Auditor Shall Be Appointed In First Board Meeting
 · ADT-1 Shall Be Filed Within 15 Days after
 the first AGM
penalties: · 12 times of Normal Fees

title: DIR-3 KYC/ DIR- 3 KYC WEB
purpose: Every Directors KYC
dueDate: Before 30th September of every year
penalties: Penalty of INR 5000 Will Be Imposed For Reactivation.

title: MSME-1
applicability: To all companies having trade payable registered under MSME Act
purpose: Half-yearly return with the registrar in respect of outstanding payments to Micro or Small Enterprise.
dueDate: Within a month for each half of the year.
penalties:
· Company and officer Penalty is INR 20,000/-
 · In the case of continuing failure - The company penalty is INR 1000 per day after the first day up subject to maximum of INR 3,00,000/-

title: DPT-3
applicability: To every company who has secured or unsecured borrowings outstanding as at balance sheet date (31st March of every year)
purpose: Every company other than Government Company shall file Return of deposit or particulars of the transactions not considered as a deposit or both
dueDate: 30th June every year
penalties:
· On Company: A fine of minimum INR. 1 crore or twice the amount of deposit so accepted, whichever is lower, which may extend to INR. 10 crore, and
 · On the officers of the Company: Who is in default: imprisonment up to seven years and with a fine of not less than INR. 25 lakh which may extend to INR. 2 crore.

title: ADT-3
applicability: For all companies whose Auditor gives resignation
purpose: Resignation of Statutory Auditor
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of Resignation.
penalties:
· Penalty of INR 50,000 or amount equal to his remuneration, whichever is less.
 · In the case of continuing failure - additional penalty of INR 500 for each day
 which will not exceed INR 5,00,000

title: AOC-4 / AOC-4 XBRL
applicability: Compulsory for all companies (Other than OPC)
purpose: Filing of Annual Financial Statement, Directors Report, Auditors Report
dueDate: Within 30 days of holding of the Annual General Meeting.
penalties:
· Late Fees : Company and officer Penalty is INR 10,000/-
 · In the case of continuing failure - The company penalty is INR 100 per day up to a maximum of INR 2,00,000/-
The officer penalty is INR 50,000/-

title: AOC-4 / AOC-4 XBRL
purpose: Filing of Annual Financial Statement, Directors Report, Auditors Report
dueDate: Within 180 days from the end of the financial year.
penalties:
· Late Fees : Company and officer Penalty is INR 10,000/-
 · In the case of continuing failure - The company penalty is INR 100 per day up to a maximum of INR 2,00,000/-
The officer penalty is INR 50,000/-

title: AOC-4 CFS
applicability: Compulsory for all companies having subsidaries (Other than OPC)
purpose: Filing of Annual Financial Statement, Directors Report, Auditors Report
dueDate: Within 30 days of holding of the Annual General Meeting.
penalties:
· Late Fees : Company and officer Penalty is INR 10,000/-
 · In the case of continuing failure - The company penalty is INR 100 per day up to a maximum of INR 2,00,000/-
The officer penalty is INR 50,000/-

title: AOC-4 NBFC
purpose: Filing of Annual Financial Statement, Directors Report, Auditors Report
dueDate: Within 30 days of holding of the Annual General Meeting.
penalties:
· Late Fees : Company and officer Penalty is INR 10,000/-
 · In the case of continuing failure - The company penalty is INR 100 per day up to a maximum of INR 2,00,000/-
The officer penalty is INR 50,000/-

title: MGT-7 / MGT-7 XBRL
applicability: Compulsory for all companies (Other than OPC)
purpose: Annual Return
dueDate: Within 60 days of holding of the Annual General Meeting.
penalties:
•        Company Penalty is INR 100/- per day
•        The officer penalty is INR 50,000 and also the late fee of Rs. 100 per day subject to a maximum of INR 5,00,000/-

title: MGT-7A
purpose: Annual Return
dueDate: Within 180 days from the end of the financial year.
penalties:
· Late Fees : Company and officer Penalty is INR 10,000/-
 · In the case of continuing failure - The company penalty is INR 100 per day up to a maximum of INR 2,00,000/-
The officer penalty is INR 50,000/-

title: MGT-14
applicability: All Public Companies at the time of adoption of books of accounts.
purpose: To register resolution for adoption of books of accounts or to pass any special resoultion at board meeting.
dueDate: Within 30 days from such resoultion is passed.
penalties:
•  Company Penalty is minimum INR 10,000/- plus INR 100/- per day for number of days the failure continues, maximum upto INR 2,00,000/-
•  The officer penalty is minimum INR 10,000/- plus INR 100/- per day for number of days the failure continues, maximum upto INR 50,000/-
•  If Company fails to pay penalties, then officer in default may also face imprisonment for up to six months or penalty of INR 25,000 to INR 1,00,000 or with both.

title: PAS-6
purpose: Reconciliation of Share Capital of unlisted public companies on a half year basis.
dueDate: April - September - 29th of November                                            October - March - 30th May
penalties:
•  Company Penalty is minimum INR 10,000/- plus INR 1000/- per day for number of days the failure continues, maximum upto INR 2,00,000/-
•  The officer penalty is minimum INR 10,000/- plus INR 1000/- per day for number of days the failure continues, maximum upto INR 50,000/-.

title: INC-22
purpose: Change in Registered Office
dueDate: Within Thirty days from the date of such change
penalties:
•  Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                             Penalty : The company and every officer who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of inr 1000/- for every day during which the default continues but not exceeding INR 1,00,000/-

title: INC-24
purpose: Change of Name of Company
dueDate: within 60 days from the date on which the Registrar approves the new name of the company, or within 30 days from the date on which a Special Resolution adopting the new name has been passed by the company, whichever is earlier.
penalties:
Penalty : The company and every officer who is in default shall be liable to
a penalty of INR 1000/- per day upto the failure continues but not exceeding INR 1,00,000.-.

title: DIR-12
purpose: Change in Directors or KMP
dueDate: Within Thirty days from the date of such change
penalties:
•  Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : Company - Minimum INR 50,000/- plus INR 500/- per day upto the failure continues, maximum upto INR 3,00,000/-.                                                             Every Officer : Minimum INR 50,000/- plus INR 500/- per day upto the failure continues, maximum upto INR 1,00,000/-.

title: SH-7
purpose: Increase in Authorized Share Capital
dueDate: Within 30 days of passing Ordinary Resolution
penalties:
•  Late Fees : Upto 60 days - 4 Times the normal Fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : Company - INR 500/- per day upto the failure continues, maximum upto INR 5,00,000/-.                                                                                                                         Every Officer : INR 500/- per day upto the failure continues, maximum upto INR 1,00,000/-.

title: PAS-3
purpose: Increase in Paid up Share Capital
dueDate: For Public at Large : Within 30 days from the date of the Allotment  For Private Placement : Within 30 days from the date of the Allotment
penalties: Allotment to the public at large : The company and the officer in default are liable to a penalty of INR 1,000 for each day of delay, up to a maximum of INR 1,00,000.                                                                                                                                      Allotment via Private Placement : The company, its promoters, and directors are liable to a penalty of INR 1,000 for each day of delay, up to a maximum of INR 25 Lacs.

title: CHG-1
purpose: Application for registration of creation and modification of Charge (other than Debentures)
dueDate: Within 30 from the date on which charge is created or modified
penalties:
•  Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 6 Times the normal Fees,  30-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees plus 0.05% of the amount secured, maximum upto INR 5,00,000/-
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                       For Small Companies and OPC Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 3 Times the normal fees, 30-90 days - 3 Times the normal fees plus 0.025% of the amount secured, maximum upto INR 1,00,000/-                                                                             * Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital                                                                         Penalty : The company shall be liable to a penalty of INR 5,00,000/- and every officer of the company shall be liable to penalty of INR 50,000/- for every such charge.

title: CHG-9
purpose: Application for Registration of Debentures
dueDate: Within 30 from the date on which charge is created or modified
penalties:
•  Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 6 Times the normal Fees,  30-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees plus 0.05% of the amount secured, maximum upto INR 5,00,000/-
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                       For Small Companies and OPC Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 3 Times the normal fees, 30-90 days - 3 Times the normal fees plus 0.025% of the amount secured, maximum upto INR 1,00,000/-                                                                             * Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital                                                                    Penalty : The company may be chagred penalty upto INR 10,00,000/- and every officer will be charged penalty of INR 1000/- for each day upto failure continues, maximum upto INR 1,00,000/-. An officer may also face improsement upto six months.

title: CHG-4
purpose: Application for Charge Satisfaction
dueDate: Within 30 days of satisfying the charge
penalties:
•  Late Fees : 30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                            Penalty : The company shall be liable to a penalty of INR 5,00,000/- and every officer of the company shall be liable to penalty of INR 50,000/- for every such charge.

title: AOC-5
purpose: Intimation to ROC for keeping books of Accounts at any office other then Registered Office of the Company.
dueDate: Within 7 days from passing the resolution.
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : Managing director, whole-time director in charge of finance, Chief Financial officer or such other person of the company shall be punishable with fine which shall not be less than INR 50,000/- but which may extend to fINR 5,00,000/-.

title: BEN-2
purpose: Return to Registrar in respect of declaration for Significant Benificial Owner
dueDate: Within 30 days whenever significant beneficial ownership is acquired or any changes to existing interests.
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : The company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of INR 1000/- for each day during which such failure continues, subject to a maximum of INR 5,00,000/- in the case of a company and INR 2,00,000/- in case of an officer who is in default.

title: Minutes Book
purpose: Minutes of BOD/AGM/EGM
dueDate: To be prepared and signed within 30 days of the meeting's conclusion.
penalties: Penalty : A penalty of INR 25,000/- for companies and INR 5000/- for officers in default in case of non-compliance of preparation of Minuted Books.

title: DIR-6
purpose: Intimation of change in particulars of Director to be given to the Central Government
dueDate: Immediately after the director becomes aware of any changes or errors in the DIN details
penalties: Upto INR 50,000/- and additional fine of inr 500/- per day upto such failure continues.

title: INC-5
purpose: Intimation by One Person Company for exceeding prescribed threshold more than Rs 50 lakh of share capital or Rs 2 crore of turnover
dueDate: Within 60 days from the date of exceeding the threshold limit
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : The company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of INR 1000/- for each day during which such failure continues, subject to a maximum of INR 5,00,000/- in the case of a company and INR 2,00,000/- in case of an officer who is in default.

title: INC-6
purpose: Conversion of private limited company into an OPC or vice versa
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of passing the special resolution.
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 3 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 6 Times the normal fees,  60-180 days - 9 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 10 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : The company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of INR 10,000/- and INR 100/- for each day during which such failure continues, subject to a maximum of INR 2,00,000/- in the case of a company and INR 50,000/- in case of an officer who is in default.

title: INC-27
purpose: Transformation of a public company into a private company and vice versa, including company limited by guarantee to a company limited by shares
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of passing the special resolution.
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : The company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of INR 1000/- for each day during which such failure continues, subject to a maximum of INR 5,00,000/- in the case of a company and INR 1,00,000/- in case of an officer who is in default.

title: INC-28
purpose: Notice of the order of the court/any other competent authority
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of passing the order
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : The company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of INR 1000/- for each day during which such failure continues, subject to a maximum of INR 5,00,000/- in the case of a company and INR 1,00,000/- in case of an officer who is in default.

title: RD-1
purpose: Application to the regional director for change in a financial year or the conversion of a public company into a private company
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of passing the special resolution.
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : The company and every officer of the company who is in default shall be liable to a penalty of INR 1000/- for each day during which such failure continues, subject to a maximum of INR 1,00,000/- in the case of a company and INR 1,00,000/- in case of an officer who is in default.

title: RD GNL-5
purpose: Form for rectification of mistakes pertaining to change in a financial year or for the conversion of a public company into a private company, etc.
dueDate: To resubmit the corrected application within 15 days. A maximum of two resubmissions are permitted.
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : If a company or its officers fail to pay the imposed penalty within 90 days from the receipt of the order, the company may face a fine ranging from ₹25,000 to ₹5,00,000. Officers in default may be subject to imprisonment up to six months, a fine between ₹25,000 and ₹1,00,000, or both

title: CRA 2
purpose: Intimation of change in particulars of Director to be given to the Central Government
dueDate: Within 30 days of the Board's resolution appointing the cost auditor or before the commencement of the financial year, whichever is earlier.
penalties:
Penalty : Company: A fine of a minimum of INR 25,000 and a maximum of INR 5,00,000
Officer: Imprisonment for up to one year or a fine of a minimum of INR 10,000 and a maximum of INR 1,00,000

title: CRA 4
purpose: Intimation of change in particulars of Director to be given to the Central Government
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of receipt of the cost audit report by the company, or within 180 days from the end of the financial year, whichever is earlier
penalties:
Late Fees : Upto 30 days - 2 Times the normal Fees,  30-60 days - 4 Times the normal fees,  60-90 days - 6 Times the normal fees, 90-180 days - 10 Times the normal fees, Above 180 days - 12 Times the normal fees
* Normal Fees is based on Paid up share capital.                                                                 Penalty : If the company fails to file the form on time, it can be penalized up to ₹5,00,000, and if the contravention continues, an additional fine of up to ₹1,00,000 can be imposed. Officer : May face a penalty of up to ₹1,00,000, and in case of continuing default, a fine of ₹5,000 per day during the default period.

title: Form 3
purpose: Changes in LLP Agreement
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of such change.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 4
purpose: Change in Partner details
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of such change.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 5
purpose: Change of Name of LLP
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of such change in Name.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 8
purpose: Statement of Account and Solvency
dueDate: Within 30 days from the end of six months of the financial year i.e. 30th October every year.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 11
purpose: Annual Return
dueDate: Within 60 days from the end of the financial year i.e. 30th May every year
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 12
purpose: Notice of Address at which books of accounts are maintained
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of such change in Address to keep Books of Accounts.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 14
purpose:
Form for intimating to Registrar of Firms about conversion of the firm into limited liability partnership (LLP).
(To be filled in physical form and submitted to Registrar of Firms)
dueDate: Within 15 days from the date of such conversion
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 15
purpose: Change of Registered Office
dueDate: Within 30 days from the date of such change in Registered Office Address.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 17
purpose: Intimating to Registrar of Firms about conversion of the firm into limited liability partnership (LLP)
dueDate: 31st July of every year
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 18
purpose: Application and Statement for conversion of a private company/ unlisted public company into limited liability partnership (LLP)
dueDate: Within 30 days of decision for Conversion
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 22
purpose: Notice of intimation of Order of Court/ Tribunal/CLB/ Central Government to the Registrar
dueDate: Within 30 days from the day of Order passed
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 24
purpose: Stricking off LLP's name
dueDate: No Specific Dure Date
penalties: No Specific Penalty

title: Form 27
purpose: Form for registration of particulars by Foreign Limited Liability Partnership (FLLP)
dueDate: Within 30 days from the event of conversion
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 28
purpose: Return of alteration in the incorporation document or other instrument constituting or defining the constitution; or the registered or principal office registered outside India
dueDate: Within 30 days from the such changes
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 29
purpose: Notice of (A) alteration in the certificate of incorporation or registration; (B) alteration in names and addresses of any of the persons authorised to accept service on behalf of a foreign limited liability partnership (FLLP) (C) alteration in the principal place of business in India of FLLP (D) cessation to have a place of business in India
dueDate: Within 30 days from the such changes
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.

title: Form 32
purpose: Form for filing addendum for rectification of defects or incompleteness
dueDate: The rectification must be completed within 15 days from the date the Registrar identifies the defect or sends the resubmission request.
penalties: Penalty : INR 100 per day of such delay, with no upper limit.
